synopsis.text: Takagi and Nishikata, on the cusp of their last year in middle school, are grappling with the uncertainty of their future. As they prepare to embark on their final summer vacation, they stumble upon a lost kitten, which they affectionately name Hana. Deciding to take responsibility for the little creature, the duo embarks on a mission to find its mother while caring for it themselves, marking the beginning of a heartfelt journey filled with laughter, camaraderie, and the sweet innocence of first love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
